channel.title: stuck exiting elevator [Fixed]
channel.description:
problem: Stuck in the door. Unable to move. Last save point is the exact same location, right after loading screen when the door are supposed to open, one door did, i got stuck in the other one.
map: bm_c1a0b
location: setpos -1310.963013 1775.992188 -160.552521; setang 9.997888 -164.864304 -0.164701
![](upload://xLMl5sngtMm55pSmgY2tPeFX3K1.jpeg)ˇ
EDIT: After the use of noclip, the door opened. i was free to go.

item.title: stuck exiting elevator [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: EISPY
item.description:
experienced this too, unless you behave properly in this elevator and exit straight away, you break the flow and get no loading

what i did was go down the ladder to explore below, afterwards going to the sliding doors would not trigger the next loading screen, had to quick-load and behave properly in the elevator

Read full topic

item.title: stuck exiting elevator [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: Mutto
item.description:
it seems as getting stuck is possible with most double automatic doors in this mod. XD

Read full topic

item.title: stuck exiting elevator [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: piter
item.description:
Same here. I jumped like crazy with crouching and got away somehow.

You can get stuck in other elevator as well. After explosion, went to the first elevator (rotating one), pushed a button and just when it started to move I walked into the exit of that elevator. Got hit (lost 1 energy point) and it got back to starting position. Had to reload.

Read full topic

item.title: stuck exiting elevator [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: jukkan
item.description:
Was just about to post this.

What happened: I dropped down from the edge of the elevator while the elevator was moving, result: “loading” screen didn’t come and I was unable to go through the door that is supposed to open.

How I fixed it: I loaded from previous save, didn’t exit the elevator until it stopped, loading screen appeared, the door opened and I was able to continue.

] status
hostname: Half-Life 2
version : 1.0.1.0/14 4104 insecure
map : bm_c1a0b at: -1294 x, 1714 y, -159 z
players : 1 (1 max)
